thread.title: BRIEF-Aroundtown: Placement Of 95 Mln Shares, Gross Proceeds Of EUR 606.1 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Aroundtown: Placement Of 95 Mln Shares, Gross Proceeds Of EUR 606.1 Mln
text:
March 9 (Reuters) - Aroundtown SA:
* DGAP-ADHOC: AROUNDTOWN SA ANNOUNCES PLACEMENT OF 95 MILLION NEW SHARES FROM CAPITAL INCREASE, RESULTING IN EUR 606.1 MILLION GROSS PROCEEDS
* RAISES SHARE CAPITAL FROM EUR 9.5 MILLION BY EUR 950,000 TO EUR 10.4 MILLION THROUGH ISSUE OF 95 MILLION SHARES
* OFFER PRICE PER NEW SHARE WAS FIXED AT EUR 6.38 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
